sentences.sentence: Diaminopimelic acid pathway is one of the lysine biosynthetic pathways.
sentences.translation: 二氨基庚二酸途径是赖氨酸生物合成途径之一。

sentences.sentence: Corynebacterium glutamicum high-serine is used as a lysine-deficient strain of the bacteria fermentation in the industry.
sentences.translation: 谷氨酸棒杆菌高丝氨酸在工业上用作细菌发酵的赖氨酸缺乏菌株。

sentences.sentence: Look at the absolute figures for lysine and arginine content.
sentences.translation: 看的赖氨酸和精氨酸含量的绝对数字。
